sentences.sContent: Stonehenge is believed to be a large earthwork constructed about 5000 years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: Stonehenge is believed to be a large earthwork constructed about 5000 years ago.
sentences.sCn: 巨石阵无疑是5000年前的一项巨大的土木工程。

sentences.sContent: Our company is an earthwork to do business!
sentences.sContent_eng: Our company is an earthwork to do business!
sentences.sCn: 我公司是一家以做土方工程的公司！

trans.tranOther: a large long pile of earth, used in the past to stop attacks
